Batcher (autotransform.batcher.base)

The base class and associated classes for Batcher components.

class autotransform.batcher.base.Batch

Bases: TypedDict

A logical grouping of Items with title and associated metadata.

metadata: typing_extensions.NotRequired[Mapping[str, Any]]
title: str
class autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher(params: autotransform.batcher.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.batcher.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Batcher components. Used by AutoTransform to separate Items in to logical groupings that can be acted on indepently and have associated metadata.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Batcher. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses.

Type

TParams

abstract batch(items: Sequence[autotransform.item.base.Item]) → List[autotransform.batcher.base.Batch]

Take filtered Items and separate in to logical groupings with associated group metadata and title.

Parameters

items (Sequence[Item]) – The filtered Items to separate.

Returns

A list of logical groupings of Items with associated group metadata and

title.

Return type

List[Batch]

bundle() → autotransform.batcher.base.BatcherBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

BatcherBundle

abstract static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Batcher.

Return type

Batcher

get_params() → autotransform.batcher.base.TParams

Gets the paramaters used to set up the Batcher.

Returns

The paramaters used to set up the Batcher.

Return type

TParams

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.batcher.type.BatcherType

Used to map Batcher components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Batcher.

Return type

BatcherType

class autotransform.batcher.base.BatcherBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Batcher object used for JSON encoding.

params: Mapping[str, Any]
